name: Super Weapon Master
description:
Super Weapon Master is an action rogue-like game where you kill hordes of enemies and face powerful bosses. Choose from powerful relics with their own unique attributes, while acquiring a variety of weapons in different styles. Enhance your character by learning related skills for weapons. Play as a weapon master, strengthen your character with gold upgrades earned each game, and unlock new characters. So as to get a better gaming experience.
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Reasonable collocation

Reasonable mix of weapons, upgrades and relic choices. Cultivate your own unique genre.
。
。
。

Adjust time acceleration at will

Click the left button to speed up or slow down at any time during the battle. Let you get a smoother gaming experience.

Freely set the aiming method of the weapon

Aiming can be set individually for each weapon. Mouse Aim or Auto Aim. Maximize weapon output.

Powerful artifact

Each artifact has a unique effect. The right choice of relics can turn your battles upside down

Super weapon

By collecting specific weapon combinations. Can synthesize super weapons. All kinds of super weapons have the strength to sweep thousands of troops. Try to choose upgrade options for the purpose of synthesizing super weapons.

Before combination

After combination

Game Features

  • More than 20 unique weapons. There are magic, firearms, cold weapons. There is always one that will satisfy you.
  • 10 super weapons. Super weapons have the power to sweep thousands of troops
  • 30+ powerful artifacts. Some relics can turn your battles upside down.
  • Over 80 upgrade options guarantee a completely different gaming experience every game
